settings.heading: How do I find my perfect size?
settings.row_content: Measure your waist at its narrowest point and compare with our size chart. For optimal shaping, choose a size that feels secure but not restrictive. 93% of our customers report finding their perfect fit on the first try.

settings.heading: Do they run true to size?
settings.row_content: For the most flattering fit, select your size based on our measurement chart rather than your usual clothing size. If between sizes, size up for daily comfort or stay true for maximum compression.

settings.heading: Will these fit my curvy/plus-size body?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! Our leggings are designed for real bodies with inclusive sizing from S-2XL. The 4-way stretch fabric adapts to your unique curves while providing consistent support where you need it most.

settings.heading: What fabric are they made from?
settings.row_content: Our premium fabric blend (90% Polyamide, 10% Elastane) delivers the perfect balance of structure and stretch. This high-quality compression material offers superior support without restricting movement.

settings.heading: Are they squat-proof/opaque?
settings.row_content: Yes, our leggings are 100% squat-proof with premium opacity testing. The reinforced fabric maintains coverage during all movements so you can focus on your workout, not your wardrobe.

settings.heading: What makes these different from regular leggings?
settings.row_content: Our leggings feature strategic seamless design, an anti-roll waistband, and targeted compression zones. Unlike regular leggings, they provide confidence-boosting support while enhancing your natural shape.

settings.heading: How do they support my fitness journey?
settings.row_content: By eliminating wardrobe anxiety, our leggings give you the confidence to focus on your workout, not your appearance. The supportive compression improves circulation and reduces muscle fatigue during exercise.

settings.heading: Will they show sweat marks?
settings.row_content: Our advanced fabric technology minimizes visible sweat marks, maintaining your confidence throughout your workout. The quick-drying material keeps you comfortable from warm-up to cool-down.

settings.heading: How do I wash/care for these?
settings.row_content: Hand wash with warm water (10°C-35°C) or machine wash on gentle cycle. Avoid harsh detergents, fabric softeners, and high heat to maintain compression integrity. Air dry for best results.

settings.heading: What's your return policy?
settings.row_content: We offer a 30-day free trial with a 100% money-back guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied, contact our customer service for a hassle-free return or exchange.

settings.heading: How quickly will my order ship?
settings.row_content: Standard shipping takes 6-8 days, while express shipping delivers within 5-8 business days. All orders include tracking information so you can monitor your delivery.

settings.heading: Can I try these risk-free?
settings.row_content: Absolutely! Your purchase is protected by our 30-day guarantee. Try them for your workouts, daily activities, or just around the house-if they don't boost your confidence, we'll refund you fully.
